item.title: Nike splits with Kyrie Irving, cancels shoe release amid antisemitism fallout: ‘There is no place for hate speech’

item.title: In an effort to wean itself off Russia's energy, the EU is running into the arms of another dictator
item.dc:creator: Yvonne Lau
item.description: The EU is promoting Azerbaijan as a “reliable" and "trustworthy" energy partner. But critics argue that the Caspian country is far from the dependable partner that the EU needs.
